TEXT.TITLE: CURTICE BURNS FOODS INC <CBI> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Qtr ends Sept 25 Shr 75 cts vs 64 cts Net 2,794,000 vs 2,363,000 Revs 157.8 mln vs 138.4 mln NOTE: 1986 qtr figures exclude effect of 1986 tax reform act which retroactively reduced earnings from 64 cts to 56 cts per shr. Reuter
